summary:
Ever wanted to play Skyrim with the epic sounds and music from the Zelda series playing in the background?
Search no more!
descriptionHtml:
What this mod does:
- Replaces the Main theme in Skyrim with the Main theme in Links Awakening.
- Adds 23 new songs wich randomly plays while exploring.
- Changes the sound of picking up a gold coin to the sound of picking up rupees from OoT.
- Changes the sound of picking up a Coin purse to the sound of picking up a yellow and a blue rupee in Twilight princess.
- Changes the sound of buying something to the sound of getting a small item.
- Changes some sounds in the Main menu and other menus.
- Changes the LVL-up music.
- Changes the combatmusic.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Music currently in-game:
- Main theme of Links Awakening
- Dark-world theme (Links Awakening) (By request of knightofjay)
- The Ballad of the Godess (SS) (By request off WolverineHowlett)
- Ocarina of time (OoT)
- Hyrule castle courtyard (OoT)
- House theme (OoT)
- Shop theme (OoT)
- Hyrule Fields morning theme (OoT)
- Market theme (OoT)
- Zelda\'s lullaby (OoT)
- Hyrule fields
- Hyrule fields (OoT)
- Termina field (MM)
- The legend of Zelda medley (OoT)
- Lonlon ranch (OoT)
- Hyrule castle (OoT)
- Princess Zelda (OoT)
- Gerudo valley (OoT)
- Kokiriforest (OoT)
- Ocarina medley (OoT)
- OoT main theme
- Kakariko village (OoT)
- Deathmountain (OoT)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Changelog:
V2.2
- Changed the Main theme again to an epic cover of the Main theme in links awakening.
- Added Main theme from Links awakening

V2.1
- Added 1 new song
- Added Darkworld theme (Links Awakening) (By request of knightofjay) 

V2.0
- Fixed the songs ending badly bug
- Added 8 new songs
- Added The Ballad of the Godess (SS) (By request of WolverineHowlett)
- Added Ocarina of time (OoT)
- Added Hyrule castle courtyard (OoT)
- Added House theme (OoT)
- Added Shop theme (OoT)
- Added Hyrule Fields morning theme (OoT)
- Added Market theme (OoT)
- Added Zelda\'s lullaby (OoT)
- Added songs to the Taverns
- Added Songs to the Towns
- Added songs to the Villages
- Added Combatmusic

V1.2
Added sounds to main menu and other menu\'s.
Added LVL-up music

V1.1
Fixed the bug were several songs were playing at the same time.
IMPORTANT!: if you had the 1.0 version installed you have to uninstall the mod before installing this version!

V1.0
First big update! (YAY!) ^_^
-Added 12 new songs wich randomly plays while exploring
-Added Hyrule fields from OoT
-Added Main theme from OoT
-Added Kokiriforest from Oot
-Added Hyrulecastle theme from OoT
-Added Lonlon ranch from OoT
-Added Kakariko village from OoT
-Added Deathmountain from OoTÂ¨
-Added Gerudo valley from OoT
-Added Princess zelda theme from OoT
-Added Ocarinamedley from OoT
-Added Legend of Zelda medley from OoT
-Added Termina field from Majoras mask
(OoT = Ocarina of Time)


V0.2
- Changed the menu theme of Skyrim to the menu theme of The legend of Zelda: Ocarina of time

V0.1
Changed the sound of picking up Gold coin\'s to the sound of Rupee\'s from Ocarina of time
Changed the sound of picking up Coin purse\'s to the sound of yellow and blue rupee\'s from Twilight princess
changed the sound of buying something to the sound of picking up a small item in Ocarina of time

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Uninstallation: you have to delete the explore folder found in Data/music/

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Also check out my other mod: Star Wars sounds in Skyrim.
Link: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12971

Feel free to add sugestions, and tell me if you find any bugs!

I can also do other mod\'s if you dont like zelda music, send me a message with sugestions for other mods. :)
author: mrLOLsir
